import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AnalyticsService } from 'src/app/services/analytics/analytics.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.scss'] }) export class AboutComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public analyticsService: AnalyticsService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } scrollToFeatures(): void { const element = document.getElementById('features'); if (element) { element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' }); } } }
